text:
<sql_rt:transaction>
          <sql_rt:query var="resultSet2"  >
             <%=((Properties)pageContext.getAttribute("sqlProps",PageContext.APP
LICATION_SCOPE)).getProperty("Simple_Select_Query") %>
          </sql_rt:query>
       </sql_rt:transaction>


fails with  javax.servlet.ServletException: In <transaction>, invalid
transaction isolation  when using javax.servlet.jsp.jstl.sql.dataSource


the problem does not occur with <sql:transaction>
creator: Lance.Andersen@Sun.COM

text: Thanks.  Fixed via a modification to the RT class itself.
